body:
I'd like to refactor some of `client/control/actions/ControlActions` before becomes a bit monolothic, but that may turn into another PR. Either way, at this point, this PR is ready for review.

edit: the refactoring will _definitely_ be in its own PR, after this has been accepted + merged
